text: Kenneth Arthur Middleditch (5 October 1925 â€“ 9 January 2021) was a British motorcycle speedway rider. He was born in Camberley, Surrey. Middleditch signed for Third Division team Hastings in 1948. By 1949 he had become Hastings top points scorer. He later played for Poole. Middleditch died on 9 January 2021, aged 95.Pirates announce the death of club legend Ken Middleditch ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Surrey
title: Ken Middleditch
